identity.mission: Create a modern, glassmorphic certificate management platform that feels ethereal yet trustworthy.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Blend SaaS utility with art-gallery aesthetics.
Emotion First: The UI should feel 'light' and 'breezy', reducing the stress of administrative tasks.
Content is King: Certificate data is the hero; the UI is the frame.
Contrast: Soft glass backgrounds vs. sharp, high-contrast text for readability.

usage_rules: Headings: Urbanist Bold/Semibold. Use tight tracking.
Body: Urbanist Medium. Ensure high contrast against glass backgrounds.
Numbers/Data: Urbanist Bold or Mono for tabular data.
Avoid 'Inter' generic look. Urbanist has character; use it.

layout.spacing: Relaxed. Use p-6 to p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

structure.sidebar: fixed left-0 top-0 h-full w-20 flex flex-col items-center py-8 z-50 glass-panel

buttons.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-500 to-purple-500 text-white shadow-lg shadow-indigo-500/30 hover:shadow-indigo-500/40 hover:scale-[1.02] transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-2 font-semibold
buttons.secondary: bg-white/50 text-slate-700 hover:bg-white/80 border border-white/20 backdrop-blur-sm shadow-sm hover:shadow transition-all rounded-full px-6 py-2
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-50/50 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-colors
buttons.icon: p-2 rounded-xl text-slate-500 hover:text-indigo-600 hover:bg-white/60 transition-all

cards.standard: bg-white/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/60 shadow-sm rounded-2xl hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300
cards.interactive: group cursor-pointer bg-white/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/60 hover:border-indigo-200/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300 rounded-2xl
cards.highlight: bg-gradient-to-br from-white/60 to-white/30 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/80 shadow-lg rounded-2xl

inputs.field: bg-white/50 border-slate-200/60 focus:border-indigo-400 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-100 rounded-xl px-4 py-2.5 outline-none transition-all placeholder:text-slate-400 backdrop-blur-sm
inputs.label: text-sm font-medium text-slate-600 mb-1.5 block

navigation.sidebar_item: w-10 h-10 flex items-center justify-center rounded-xl text-slate-500 hover:bg-indigo-50 hover:text-indigo-600 transition-all mb-4 relative group
navigation.sidebar_active: bg-gradient-to-br from-indigo-500 to-purple-500 text-white shadow-lg shadow-indigo-500/25

tables.container: rounded-2xl overflow-hidden border border-white/40 bg-white/20 backdrop-blur-sm
tables.header: bg-white/30 text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wider text-slate-500 border-b border-white/40

glass_effect.css: background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4); backdrop-filter: blur(12px); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);

gradients.background_mesh: fixed inset-0 z-[-1] bg-[radial-gradient(ellipse_at_top_left,_var(--tw-gradient-stops))] from-indigo-100/50 via-purple-50/30 to-white

backgrounds.description: Soft blue/purple gradient mesh for subtle background overlay
Light refraction pattern for login/hero sections

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. GLOBAL STYLES: Update index.css to include the mesh gradient background on the body.
2. LAYOUT: Refactor the Layout component to use a fixed, icon-only sidebar on the left and a scrollable main content area.
3. DASHBOARD: Convert dashboard stats into 'Glass Cards'. Use the Bento grid layout.
4. COMPONENTS: heavily customize shadcn components. Remove default solid backgrounds and replace with 'bg-white/40' and 'backdrop-blur'.
5. BUTTONS: Replace all primary buttons with the 'Pill Gradient' style.
6. TABLES: Update data tables to be 'floating' - no outer border, but rounded corners and glass backgrounds.
7. CERTIFICATES: Keep the 'Gold' accents for the actual certificate rendering, but the UI around it should remain Blue/Purple glass.
8. ICONS: Use Lucide-react (already installed). Use stroke-width={1.5} for a lighter, elegant look.
9. CRITICAL: Ensure text contrast is sufficient on semi-transparent backgrounds. Use text-slate-900 for primary text.
10. THEME: Enforce Light Mode logic for the glass effect. Dark mode glass requires different opacity/colors (slate-900/40), but prioritize the Light/Lavender look first as requested.
universal_guidelines: Do NOT use standard Shadcn cards without modification.
Do NOT use solid gray backgrounds for the app container.
Respect the 'Urbanist' font family for all text.
